trans-unit.source: How to configure notifications and email templates in Azure API Management
trans-unit.target: How to configure notifications and email templates in Azure API Management

trans-unit.source: Learn how to configure notifications and email templates in Azure API Management.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to configure notifications and email templates in Azure API Management.

trans-unit.source: How to configure notifications and email templates in Azure API Management
trans-unit.target: How to configure notifications and email templates in Azure API Management

trans-unit.source: API Management provides the ability to configure notifications for specific events, and to configure the email templates that are used to communicate with the administrators and developers of an API Management instance.
trans-unit.target: API Management provides the ability to configure notifications for specific events, and to configure the email templates that are used to communicate with the administrators and developers of an API Management instance.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to configure notifications for the available events, and provides an overview of configuring the email templates used for these events.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to configure notifications for the available events, and provides an overview of configuring the email templates used for these events.

trans-unit.source: Configure publisher notifications
trans-unit.target: Configure publisher notifications

trans-unit.source: To configure notifications, click **Manage** in the Azure Portal for your API Management service.
trans-unit.target: To configure notifications, click **Manage** in the Azure Portal for your API Management service.

trans-unit.source: This takes you to the API Management publisher portal.
trans-unit.target: This takes you to the API Management publisher portal.

trans-unit.source: Publisher portal
trans-unit.target: Publisher portal

trans-unit.source: If you have not yet created an API Management service instance, see [Create an API Management service instance][] in the [Get started with Azure API Management][] tutorial.
trans-unit.target: If you have not yet created an API Management service instance, see [Create an API Management service instance][] in the [Get started with Azure API Management][] tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Click **Notifications** from the **API Management** menu on the left to view the available notifications.
trans-unit.target: Click **Notifications** from the **API Management** menu on the left to view the available notifications.

trans-unit.source: Publisher notifications
trans-unit.target: Publisher notifications

trans-unit.source: The following list of events can be configured for notifications.
trans-unit.target: The following list of events can be configured for notifications.

trans-unit.source: **Subscription requests (requiring approval)** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications about subscription requests for API products requiring approval.
trans-unit.target: **Subscription requests (requiring approval)** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications about subscription requests for API products requiring approval.

trans-unit.source: **New subscriptions** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications about new API product subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: **New subscriptions** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications about new API product subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: **Application gallery requests** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications when new applications are submitted to the application gallery.
trans-unit.target: **Application gallery requests** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications when new applications are submitted to the application gallery.

trans-unit.source: **BCC** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email blind carbon copies of all emails sent to developers.
trans-unit.target: **BCC** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email blind carbon copies of all emails sent to developers.

trans-unit.source: **New issue or comment** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications when a new issue or comment is submitted on the developer portal.
trans-unit.target: **New issue or comment** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications when a new issue or comment is submitted on the developer portal.

trans-unit.source: **Close account message** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications when an account is closed.
trans-unit.target: **Close account message** - The specified email recipients and users will receive email notifications when an account is closed.

trans-unit.source: **Approaching subscription quota limit** - The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when subscription usage gets close to usage quota.
trans-unit.target: **Approaching subscription quota limit** - The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when subscription usage gets close to usage quota.

trans-unit.source: For each event, you can specify email recipients using the email address text box or you can select users from a list.
trans-unit.target: For each event, you can specify email recipients using the email address text box or you can select users from a list.

trans-unit.source: To specify the email addresses to be notified, enter them in the email address text box.
trans-unit.target: To specify the email addresses to be notified, enter them in the email address text box.

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple email addresses, separate them using commas.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple email addresses, separate them using commas.

trans-unit.source: Notification recipients
trans-unit.target: Notification recipients

trans-unit.source: To specify the users to be notified, click **add recipient**, check the box beside the users to be notified, and click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: To specify the users to be notified, click **add recipient**, check the box beside the users to be notified, and click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: Note that only administrators are displayed in the list.
trans-unit.target: Note that only administrators are displayed in the list.

trans-unit.source: After configuring the notification recipients, click **Save** to apply the updated notification recipients.
trans-unit.target: After configuring the notification recipients, click **Save** to apply the updated notification recipients.

trans-unit.source: If you navigate away from the **Publisher Notifications** tab the API Management portal alerts you if there are unsaved changes.
trans-unit.target: If you navigate away from the **Publisher Notifications** tab the API Management portal alerts you if there are unsaved changes.

trans-unit.source: Configure email templates
trans-unit.target: Configure email templates

trans-unit.source: API Management provides email templates for the email messages that are sent in the course of administering and using the service.
trans-unit.target: API Management provides email templates for the email messages that are sent in the course of administering and using the service.

trans-unit.source: The following email templates are provided.
trans-unit.target: The following email templates are provided.

trans-unit.source: Application gallery submission approved
trans-unit.target: Application gallery submission approved

trans-unit.source: Developer farewell letter
trans-unit.target: Developer farewell letter

trans-unit.source: Developer quota limit approaching notification
trans-unit.target: Developer quota limit approaching notification

trans-unit.source: Invite user
trans-unit.target: Invite user

trans-unit.source: New comment added to an issue
trans-unit.target: New comment added to an issue

trans-unit.source: New issue received
trans-unit.target: New issue received

trans-unit.source: New subscription activated
trans-unit.target: New subscription activated

trans-unit.source: Subscription renewed confirmation
trans-unit.target: Subscription renewed confirmation

trans-unit.source: Subscription request declines
trans-unit.target: Subscription request declines

trans-unit.source: Subscription request received
trans-unit.target: Subscription request received

trans-unit.source: These templates can be modified as desired.
trans-unit.target: These templates can be modified as desired.

trans-unit.source: To view and configure the email templates for your API Management instance, click **Notifications** from the **API Management** menu on the left, and select the **Email Templates** tab.
trans-unit.target: To view and configure the email templates for your API Management instance, click **Notifications** from the **API Management** menu on the left, and select the **Email Templates** tab.

trans-unit.source: Email templates
trans-unit.target: Email templates

trans-unit.source: To view or modify a specific template, select it from the **Templates** drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: To view or modify a specific template, select it from the **Templates** drop-down list.

trans-unit.source: Email templates list
trans-unit.target: Email templates list

trans-unit.source: Each email template has a subject in plain text, and a body definition in HTML format.
trans-unit.target: Each email template has a subject in plain text, and a body definition in HTML format.

trans-unit.source: Each item can be customized as desired.
trans-unit.target: Each item can be customized as desired.

trans-unit.source: Email template editor
trans-unit.target: Email template editor

trans-unit.source: The **Parameters** list contains a list of parameters, which when inserted into the subject or body, will be replaced the designated value when the email is sent.
trans-unit.target: The **Parameters** list contains a list of parameters, which when inserted into the subject or body, will be replaced the designated value when the email is sent.

trans-unit.source: To insert a parameter, place the cursor where you wish the parameter to go, and click the arrow to the left of the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: To insert a parameter, place the cursor where you wish the parameter to go, and click the arrow to the left of the parameter name.

trans-unit.source: Click **Preview** or **Send a test** to see how the email will look or send a test email.
trans-unit.target: Click **Preview** or **Send a test** to see how the email will look or send a test email.

trans-unit.source: Note that the parameters are not replaced with actual values when previewing or sending a test.
trans-unit.target: Note that the parameters are not replaced with actual values when previewing or sending a test.

trans-unit.source: To save the changes to the email template, click **Save**, or to cancel the changes click **Cancel**.
trans-unit.target: To save the changes to the email template, click **Save**, or to cancel the changes click **Cancel**.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
